PyGEOS
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PyGEOS installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PyGEOS, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PyGEOS/0.14-gfbf-2023a
```
